section.title: Installing syslog-ng without user-interaction on Windows
section.para: The &product; application can be installed in silent mode as well, without requiring any user interaction. The various installer options can be specified as command-line options. Using the /S option is required. The following options are available:

listitem.para: Start the &abbrev; service (/A=yes) when the installation is finished. The &abbrev; service will start only if a valid license and a configuration file is installed as well.
Install the &abbrev; into the specified folder (%INSTALLDIR%).

warning.para: If you use the /D option, make sure that this is the last option in the command-line. For example: syslog-ng-<version>-setup.exe /S /D=c:\syslog-ng\

listitem.para: Enter the path to the &abbrev; configuration file. The installer will copy the specified configuration file to %INSTALLDIR%\etc\syslog-ng.conf.
Enter the path to the license file. The installer will copy the specified license file to %INSTALLDIR%\etc\license.txt.
Add entries about &abbrev; to the Start menu.
Start the installer in silent mode. This option is required for the silent installation.
